thread.title: Lana Del Rey's 'Love' music video features dreamy car rides through space
thread.title_full: Lana Del Rey's 'Love' music video features dreamy car rides through space

author: USA TODAY
title: Lana Del Rey's 'Love' music video features dreamy car rides through space
text:
Lana Del Rey's 'Love' music video features dreamy car rides through space Sara M Moniuszko , USA TODAY 1:01 p.m. ET Feb. 20, 2017 17 Shares 
Get ready for a starry trip down lovers lane. 
The cosmic new music video for Lana Del Rey ’s single Love was released today and is giving us major 70’s romance vibes. 
The song, which was released on Saturday, reminisces on what it’s like to be young and in love. 
The video focuses on a groovy-looking Lana with flower-adorned locks as well as numerous couples going on typical teenage dates like going to the movies and driving through outer space? Ok, so maybe not always so typical. 
As per usual, the Summertime Sadness singer delivered a beautifully trippy video that matches the lyrics of her song perfectly: “It’s enough to just make you feel crazy sometimes." 
Watch the full video above. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lnvUXs Most Popular
